responses: What can I do for you?

patterns: Can you provide instructions about this chat?
Can you tell me how to talk with you?
How do I use this application?
responses: Of course. I am a prototype of chat that should help you get familiar with out company. You can just ask me any question about anything regarding on-boarding and any other company related things. Keep in mind that I am not trained enough yet to remember context of previous questions.
